title: Spectral identification and estimation of mixed causal-noncausal invertible-noninvertible models. (arXiv:2310.19543v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: This paper introduces new techniques for estimating, identifying and simulating mixed causal-noncausal invertible-noninvertible models. We propose a framework that integrates high-order cumulants, merging both the spectrum and bispectrum into a single estimation function. The model that most adequately represents the data under the assumption that the error term is i.i.d. is selected. Our Monte Carlo study reveals unbiased parameter estimates and a high frequency with which correct models are identified. We illustrate our strategy through an empirical analysis of returns from 24 Fama-French emerging market stock portfolios. The findings suggest that each portfolio displays noncausal dynamics, producing white noise residuals devoid of conditional heteroscedastic effects.

translated_title: 混合因果-非因果可逆-不可逆模型的谱识别和估计
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了一种用于估计、识别和模拟混合因果-非因果可逆-不可逆模型的新技术。我们提出了一个框架，将高阶累积量集成到一个单一估计函数中，合并了谱和双谱。在假设误差项是独立同分布的条件下，选择最能代表数据的模型。我们的蒙特卡洛研究显示出无偏的参数估计和高频率的正确模型识别。我们通过对24个Fama-French新兴市场股票组合收益进行实证分析来说明我们的策略。研究结果表明，每个组合显示出非因果动力学，产生缺乏条件异方差效应的白噪声残差。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种新的技术，用于估计、识别和模拟混合因果-非因果可逆-不可逆模型。该方法将高阶累积量集成到一个估计函数中，选择最能代表数据的模型。研究结果显示出无偏的参数估计和高频率的正确模型识别。实证分析表明，被研究的股票组合显示出非因果动力学，产生缺乏条件异方差效应的白噪声残差。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces new techniques for estimating, identifying, and simulating mixed causal-noncausal invertible-noninvertible models. The proposed framework incorporates high-order cumulants to merge both the spectrum and bispectrum into a single estimation function. The study reveals unbiased parameter estimates and a high frequency of correct model identification. Empirical analysis shows that the analyzed stock portfolios exhibit noncausal dynamics, with white noise residuals devoid of conditional heteroscedastic effects.
